meanings.definition: A person who drives a vehicle.
meanings.sent1: The drivers on the road must follow traffic rules.
meanings.sent2: The taxi driver picked up passengers at the airport.
meanings.sent3: The drivers in the race were all eager to win.
meanings.sent4: She was the main driver behind the success of the project.
meanings.sent5: The drivers in the city were always in a hurry, honking their horns.

meanings.definition: A tool or device used to insert or remove screws.
meanings.sent1: He used a screwdriver to tighten the screws.
meanings.sent2: The mechanic's toolbox contained various types of drivers.
meanings.sent3: The tiny drivers were too small for the large screws.
meanings.sent4: The power drill acted as a fast and efficient driver.
meanings.sent5: The magnetic driver made it easy to work with metal screws.

meanings.definition: A program that controls a specific type of hardware device.
meanings.sent1: The computer needed the latest drivers to function properly.
meanings.sent2: The printer driver allowed the computer to communicate with the printer.
meanings.sent3: The outdated driver caused the device to malfunction.
meanings.sent4: The driver update improved the performance of the hardware.
meanings.sent5: Installing the correct driver resolved the connectivity issue.
